    Justin Ryan L. Ayubo
    1st Year - BS Information Technology
    Ateneo de Naga University
    Practice(Peer)
    Problem Code: BIT
                                         */
#include <iostream>
#include <bitset>
using namespace std;
int main(){
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    int T=0;
    cin >> T;
    
    while(T--)
    {
    int in=0;
    cin >> in;
    int count=0;
    
    for(int i=1;i<=in;i++)
    {
    bitset<10> a(i);
    
    for(int j=0;j<10;j++)
     if(a[j] == 1)
      count++;
      }
      
    cout << count << endl;
    }
    
    return 0;
    }
